title: RHCP's Klinghoffer: The Biggest Issue I Have With Phones During Shows Is Blatant Disregard Of Person Behind You [News]
text:
UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 8 hours ago 12 
A few months back in Italy, Josh Klinghoffer caught the attention of the music community by filming the crowd with his phone instead of playing the solo part during " Californication " as a protest towards the smartphone-armed crowd. 
And now, the RHCP guitarist told Devo Brown that the thing that bugs him the most is people disregarding the crowd behind them while filming. 
He said: "I don't look out very often, and I've been at shows wanting to take a quick video, but it's this [mimics person standing with phone up for a long time] - it's blatant disregard for the person behind you! One quick moment - sure, but there are people who do it the entire time."
